description:
RPE Recorder is a chart recorder designed for providing a better look for standard-compliant Re: PhiEdit and PhiEdit charts, written with C++ by 不会特效の点缀星空.

Before posting a request, make sure that your chart meets the following requirement:
There's no use of features of RPE except for multiple event layers, all attributes of normal events (move, rotate, alpha, speed), all attributes of storyboard (XY scale events, text events, color events, UI attach), all attributes of notes, speed changes of hold, parent lines, negative alpha of lines, XY unsync, cover / uncover, and Z order of lines.
Substandard charts will be declined.
chart_placeholder: Re: PhiEdit charts allowed only. Upload your chart JSON file here
illustration_placeholder: JPG / JPEG / PNG, no larger than 6MB (16:9 recommended)
config_placeholder: SET file, generated by the settings generator
